tool_description: Easily integrate Memre adaptive learning software with your internal systems to optimize memory retention, build lasting knowledge, and create expertise.
name: Learning Engine
title: Learning Engine

api_list.name: /memre_api/v2/study
api_list.description: Get the study items (memre_api_items) for the user.

api_list.name: /memre_api/v1/study
api_list.description: Get items a specific user should study.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the user you want to get learning items for

api_list.name: /memre_api/v1/readiness
api_list.description: Get the readiness of the user for the specified item.

api_list.name: /memre_api/v1/concepts
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of concepts for the current customer.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://learning-engine.p.rapidapi.com/memre_api/v1/concepts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "learning-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://learning-engine.p.rapidapi.com/memre_api/v1/concepts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "learning-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /memre_api/v2/readiness
api_list.description: Get the readiness of the user for the specified set of items.

api_list.name: /memre_api/v1/concepts/{id}
api_list.description: Retrieve the details of a specific concept by ID.
